room_title: Escape room "Athens Arcade" by Escape the Space in Athens
room_description: â€‹Over the past 5 years, Escape The Space has created over 20 storyline driven rooms. Our escapees have stolen millions, discovered murderers, and defused bombs. This time, we decided to do something a bit different. What if we created an escape room that was so fun the difficulty was forcing yourself to leave? Introducing an escape room packed with fully functioning arcade cabinets and a variety of game tables...try not to get distracted, and make sure to escape!
